DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indicates the kind of surface feature.

DocWhereRule.Name: HasObjectType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given if the predefined type is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT EXISTS(PredefinedType) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcSurfaceFeatureTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType)
